name: Sauce Segretto
instructions: In a large frying pan, melt one stick of butter and cook onion, carrot and celery about 10 minutes, until onion is translucent. Add tomatoes and mash with spoon. Cook over medium-low heat about 30 to 40 minutes until sauce starts to thicken slightly and picks up slightly orange color of carrot.
Cut remaining butter into slices and whisk into sauce. Season with salt, pepper and red pepper flakes. Serve sauce over spaghetti.
